resources.string: Sorry, i can\'t read your saved wifi password. If you can with a root explorer search inside your data folder (usually \"data/misc/wifi\" or \"data/wifi\" ) and search for a file called \"wpa_supplicant.conf\" or something similar and email its position to us! Thanks :)

You DON\'T have the root access, this app won\'t work! Please don\'t rate it badly on the play store. If you don\'t know what is the root access you can uninstall this app, because is useless for you.
Please grand root permission to the app
This app use RootShell by Stericson
